channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- EAP

item.title: CVE-2016-7061|2024-08-06T01:50:47.561Z -- red%20hat -- eap
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability was found in JBoss Enterprise Application Platform before 7.0.4. It was discovered that when configuring RBAC and marking information as sensitive, users with a Monitor role are able to view the sensitive information.
